subtitle: Ideal for serving with ice cream, mousses and many other desserts.

method.text: Place the raspberries and Kirsch in a food processor. Process until smooth. Sieve, discarding the seeds.
Transfer the puree to a pan. Add the sugar. Heat gently for 2-3 min or until sugar has melted.
Mix the arrowroot with the cold water. Remove pan from heat. Stir in the arrowroot until well mixed. Bring to the boil gently, stirring constantly for 1-2 min until sauce thickens and clears.

title: Melba sauce
